BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Developmental Disability, Alcoholism, Substance Abuse and Disability Services

Items.Title: Oversight – Access to EPIC Drug Benefits for Persons with Disabilities
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight – Access to EPIC Drug Benefits for Persons with Disabilities

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to adopt S. 2644 and A. 5178, legislation which would make certain persons who are eligible for or receiving social security disability insurance (SSDI) benefits eligible for the Elderly Pharmaceutical Insurance Coverage (EPIC) program.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Make certain persons who are eligible for or receiving social security disability insurance (SSDI) benefits eligible for Elderly Pharmaceutical Insurance Coverage (EPIC) program. (S.2644 and A.5178)

Items.Title: Oversight – Access to EPIC Drug Benefits for Persons with Disabilities
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
